Text: Maniac (stylized as MANIAC) is an American short slasher film, directed by Shia LaBeouf.

Text: Maniac (2011 film):  The short film stars American rappers Scott "Kid Cudi" Mecudi and Chris "Cage" Palko, as French-speaking serial killers. Mescudi and Palko also co-wrote the film with LaBeouf.
